name: Leslie
review: This is a quality mirror. Inexpensive, beautiful, feels good. Glad I bought it and I like using it. It has a pretty color and it's user friendly. Fits like a glove. Joy to own.

name: redfear
review: works well, needed it for makeup and to see back of hair

name: Baba
review: The rrubberized frame around the mirror and handle make it comfortable to hold as well as make it durable if you bump it or drop it.

name: Markat
review: I like the size and sturdiness of this mirror and the way the handle feels.  I bought a second mirror so I can leave one of them in my suitcase ready to go for my next travel adventure.

name: Brenda the reader
review: I use it to pull hairs around my chin.

name: I'm Bananas
review: The size is perfect to see back of head and how hair looks.  Light weight.  Drop proof!

name: firekracker923
review: This is a very nice mirror for the price. Easy to grip and very clear image.

name: Paty
review: One side is fine, but the other side mirror to much

name: JanB
review: This is a very handy mirror. It is regular view on one side and magnifier on the other.  It is just the right size to hold in your hand.

name: Moni
review: I like the mirror.

name: Jules
review: Perfect

name: Janet
review: This may suit someone, but I felt like I was cross-eyed looking through the mirror.  I am going to return it.

name: Jess
review: This mirror does exactly what I need it to do. I like that it also has a magnified side.

name: Charlie
review: Nice and simple design.  Very pleased

name: Amanda
review: I use this product to put my make up on, tweeze eyebrows, see the back of my hair... I like the rubber grip in the handle

name: JayCee
review: I use the magnified side of the mirror for close up facial work. Love it. This is my second one.

name: PJ
review: too heavy

name: penny pincher
review: sturdy

name: Nan
review: Styling Hair

name: xrayxposer
review: Love it works great when applying makeup for bifocal wearers

name: SexyCurls
review: I use this mirror to do my makeup. I like that it has magnification side and normal side. It's easy to do my makeup with the regular side, and easily flip it to tweeze my eyebrows with the magnified size. The only thing that I don't like is that sometimes if I'm doing more complex looks, it takes me an hour and the mirror can get a little heavy to hold that long :)

name: Becca
review: I love how the handles are soft and it s a two sided mirror. I use it to apply my makeup and when I do my hair it's pretty handy to use it to look at the back of my head.

name: Tia Maria
review: Good makeup and hair mirror

name: Mary
review: Very nice. I liked it alot and I purchased one for a gift. She seems to see it as very useful.

name: Alby
review: I use it to do my hair and makeup every day. It is convenient to take with me on trips for my hair and makeup. I do wish it was a 3x magnification instead of 5x.  I couldn't find a 3x when I bought this.

name: Jilla
review: A great mirror for applying makeup - sturdy but easy to hold one-handed.

name: Cor
review: My Sister was visiting and there aren't an abundance of store choices where she lives.  I had mentioned a recent shopping trip to Ulta and she started checking out the website.  When she came across her favorite makeup mirror from Revlon she told me how much she missed the one she broke.  I took her to the store where we found the mirror and she was overjoyed.  It's always great to find what you're looking for.  The next time she comes for a visit, I think we will be spending more time browsing.

name: ohtammy
review: it is easy to hold...not too heavy...clear image!

name: Marilyn
review: I use by putting on makeup and my husband uses to shave.  It is so sharp (sometimes shows too much lol).  It is excellent.

name: CC
review: the magnifer side is excellent... I had been using a mirror that was 15 years old, and wow !  what a difference.

name: Traveler54
review: I bought this mirror to replace the last of three that the handle had broken off. I was looking for something very sturdy with a handle. This mirror fits the bill. My only suggestions would be to make the actual mirror slightly larger.

name: Rio 070707
review: Nice handle but mirror is distorted

name: Kim
review: This mirror is easy to grip when putting on makeup - non plastic so won't brake like my other mirror did.

name: Jen the mom.
review: Great value. Lightweight and easy to handle for daily use. Hole in the handle for hanging.

name: Moongirl
review: I wear glasses for seeing up close and the magnification side is PERFECT for putting on all my eye makeup.  I use the flip side for checking out the back of my hair.  It's sturdy, the handle is the perfect size and it's not too big, not too small.   I love this mirror.

name: iilynda
review: Cheap and its double sided. So far so good

name: Swisskitty
review: Ergonomically perfect. I have it hanging on a hook in my bathroom. I like that it doesn't feel flimsy. I also prefer that the handle is static. I had one whose handle was adjustable. It was annoying and when I tried to tighten the screw, the whole mirror broke. OOPS!

name: Me me me me me
review:
The mirror surface itself is 5 inches in diameter. 10 1/2 inches refers to the top of the mirror to the bottom of the handle. The back side of the mirror is a magnified mirror.
The front mirror has the word REVLON etched into the glass. I find this annoying as it cuts into the amount of space I can use effectively.

name: Bill
review: I find the description a little misleading "Revlon Large Hand Mirror 10-1/2".  I assumed the mirror was 10-1/2" in diameter.  It's not.  It's outside diameter is 6-1/4" and the mirror glass itself is 5".  The mirror's overall length from end to end is 10-1/2".  The frame and handle are rubberized, easy to hold on to.  The magnified side is quite powerful.It appears to be a quality product. The one pictured looks pink, the one I received is black, which I'm happy for.

name: Valentine
review: This mirror is used in the bathroom.  The grip handle helps to prevent being dropped in the shower.

name: bb
review: Low magnification

name: kathy
review: just a standard mirror but perfect for my needs

name: ckhill2014
review: This makeup is perfect for quick application, but difficult to hold for longer periods of time because it is heavy

name: MJ
review: This is my favorite hand mirror ever! Easy on off hook for wall. Soft! The bouncy soft material around the handle and mirror not only makes it a dream to hold but it cushions the mirror too. Makes me feel safer if I accidentally knock it off the counter drop it or set it down roughly. These are a simple item I know....but these really are the shiz.

name: Lin
review: Magnifying side great for the mature

name: XtineO
review: Good, simple mirror.  Was exactly what I was looking for when I was shopping for a handheld mirror.

name: Suz
review: Exactly what I was looking for.

name: meee
review: none

name: Sandra
review: Bought the mirror to help me keep my eyebrows groomed.  Perfect magnification without distorting.  The 10X magnify mirrors, hurt my eyes, but this one is perfect!

name: Wyles
review: Check hair and makeup.

name: Norm
review: It's a good mirror to have when you don't want to have to leave your room in order to do your hair or put your make-up on.

name: Ginn
review: Not what I was needing

name: Krista
review: Great product, good price point.

name: budget buyer
review: I use this to check my hair on the sides and in back.

name: Laurie
review: This mirror was larger then I thought it would be.  It also has a soft rubber like edge that prevents it from slipping from your hand.  It was made by Revlon, so I should have expected the quality!

name: KW
review: Used daily.

name: Ageisjustanumber
review: My old Revlon 2-sided mirror disintegrated from all the creams & lotions (the handle) and most of the ULTA's in my area did not restock this mirror - had almost given up but found another one while on vacation in Palm Desert!  It has the perfect magnification for me.

name: Lauren
review: To apply makeup

name: Dana
review: This is a great mirror, I just wish I could've picked the color I received.

name: Sheila
review: With the exception of the above, the mirror is fine.

name: Reggie
review: Easy to hold on to.
